content: In Q4, we made a big push around enablement to get our salesforce more comfortable, being able to talk about both the problems and then how we apply solutions to issues like infrastructure automation or how to automate runbooks to support faster incident response or compress the time and the impact of an incident, how to think about engaging with customer service leaders in terms of the customer service operations, conversation and increasingly getting comfortable about talking about AI in terms of event orchestration and really starting to understand the impact of dependent services and being able to orchestrate, work more effectively, orchestrate event correlation more effectively.
